question: Which Indian cricketer has been awarded the honorary life membership of Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC)?
explanation: VVS Laxman, the former India batsman, has been awarded the honorary life membership of Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC). With this, he joined fellow Indian icons Sachin Tendulkar, Rahul Dravid and Sourav Ganguly on the prestigious list of MCC Honorary Life Members. He played 134 Tests, 86 One-Day Internationals and 25 Twenty20 internationals for India.  Currently, he is mentor of Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) franchise in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
